ARGUMENT
f

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | islvec.1 | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( f = W -> ( Scalar ` f ) = ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 3 | 2, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( f = W -> ( Scalar ` f ) = F ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( f = W -> ( ( Scalar ` f ) e. DivRing <-> F e. DivRing ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-lvec | |- LVec = { f e. LMod | ( Scalar ` f ) e. DivRing } |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( W e. LVec <-> ( W e. LMod /\ F e. DivRing ) ) |
